cxt(kit): Coalescence x Translation (toolkit)
=============================================


``cxt`` stands for coalescence x translation and thereby proposing a sequence or language modelling approach to population genetic inference.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   
   installation
   tutorial
   simulation
   training
   api
